DOC.brief_title: Project Impact 2 : A Culturally Tailored Smoking Cessation Intervention Latino Smokers
DOC.detailed_description: Baseline Visit : If agree take part study , follow test procedure perform begin study : - You complete 10 questionnaire demographic ( age , race , sex , ) , medical history , smoke status , alcohol use , religion , `` control '' feel life , cultural background . These take 1½ hour complete . - You complete carbon monoxide ( CO ) test measure level carbon monoxide body . This test involve blow breath hand-held device . - You learn keep diary progress attempt quit smoke . °You must bring diary every visit . - You ask smoke non-tobacco substance last 2 day . If , provide additional CO sample 2 day last time smoke substance . - If become pregnant , urine pregnancy test . To take part study , must pregnant.3 - The total length baseline visit approximately 2.5 hour . Study Groups : You randomly assign ( roll dice ) 1 3 study group . You equal chance group . This do one know one study group well , , bad group . Counseling Sessions : The study group determine way health information present one-on-one counseling session . - If Group 1 , receive general health education . The counselor discus health topic ( sleep , nutrition , exercise ) relate smoke . The counselor also give handout health topic . - If Group 2 , counselor discus smoke culture may relate . The counselor also provide read material highlight aspect culture relate health , smoke quit . - If Group 3 , receive cultural counseling handout Group 2 receive . Also , additional talk use drug help stop smoking common feeling Latinos may experience unsuccessful try quit . The counselor also offer plan use medication successfully . All participant attend 3 counseling session study . Each counseling session audio record . Your first counseling session baseline . The two counseling session Week 2 Week 6 visit ( describe ) . All participant give 12 week supply nicotine patch information use nicotine patch . At study visit , give amount patch need last next visit , plus extra event patch fall damage . During first counseling session , ask choose quit date . This simply date would like begin use patch make attempt smoke . Week 2 Week 6 Study Visits : At study visit , participant follow procedure : - You complete brief interview progress side effect may . This take 10 minute complete . - You complete 2 questionnaire tobacco use satisfaction study . These take 10 minute complete . - You complete CO test . - You ask smoked substance , marijuana , last 2 day . If , provide additional CO sample 2 day last time smoke substance . Follow-Up Visits : About 3 month 6 month baseline , follow-up visit . At visit , follow test procedure perform : - You complete set questionnaire tobacco alcohol use , culture , religion , sense control baseline visit . - You complete CO test . - You ask smoke non-tobacco substance last 2 day . If , provide additional CO sample 2 day last time smoke substance . Length Study : Your study participation complete 6-month follow-up visit . This investigational study . Up 36 people enrol study . All take part MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adults least 18 year age 2 . Current smoker ( > 5 cigarette per day past 3 month ) 3 . Able speak read English Spanish 4 . Agree participate study available 6 week treatment 6 month followup 5 . Willing set quit date within 2 week enrollment date 6 . Identify Latino heritage , ethnicity , ancestry 1 . Individuals suffer unstable medical condition precluding use NRT ( Identified use Medical History Questionnaire give baseline ) 2 . Currently use smokeless tobacco , electronic nicotine delivery system ( ENDS ) , nicotine replacement therapy , smoke cessation treatment 3 . Pregnant nursing 4 . Suffering severe psychiatric disorder ( assess use selfreporting history psychiatric diagnosis phone screening ) would interfere participation 5 . Diagnosis substance dependence nicotine ( screen use DSM IV TR criterion ) Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition 6 . Individuals access work telephone
